overview: Piotr Sienkiewicz is the cofounder of MSP, the first commercial software distributor in Poland. After broadening the product range to include hardware and several years of organic growth, MSP merged with a Czech distributor and then acquired a Hungarian enterprise. Piotr then, successfully, sold MSP to a large multinational. Piotr has also cofounded Polandâ€™s first Internet provider and Internet application developer, Polska OnLine, for which he obtained VC funding, then acquired a software house, and went on to successfully sell to a global telecom (TeleDanmark). Partner at an early stage VC fund hardGAMMA Ventures and o9ne of the organizers of PitchRally â€“ closed meetings for startups and investors.
